problem: 如图,在▱ABCD中,BF平分∠ABC,交AD于点F,CE平分∠BCD,交AD于点E,AB=6,EF=2,则BC长为()
answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AD∥BC,DC=AB=6,AD=BC,∴∠AFB=∠FBC,∵BF平分∠ABC,∴∠ABF=∠FBC,则∠ABF=∠AFB,∴AF=AB=6,同理可证:DE=DC=6,∵EF=AF+DE-AD=2,即6+6-AD=2,解得:AD=10；故选:B．
comment: 本题主要考查了平行四边形的性质、等腰三角形的判定；熟练掌握平行四边形的性质,证出AF=AB是解决问题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, BF bisects ∠ABC, crosses AD at point F, CE bisects ∠BCD, crosses AD at point E, AB = N_0, EF = N_1, then the length of BC is ()
